title: Love Among the Walnuts, Or: How I Saved My Family from Being Poisoned
description: IT STARTED WITH A BIRTHDAY CAKE . . . CHOCK FULL OF POISON.Alexander Huntington-Ackerman --- AHA, or Sandy for short --- didn't expect his whole life to be a free ride (even though his parents are multimillionaires and he lives in a mansion). He certainly didn't expect his two money-grubbing uncles to try to kill everyone with a drugged birthday cake. Luckily for Sandy, the cake only sends his parents (and their pet chicken Attila) into comas. Along with his loyal butler and a wacky nurse from Walnut Manor, the loony bin next door, Sandy is determined to bring the scoundrels to rights --- if he's not the next to go!
author: Jean Ferris
